website_summaries.verdict: These have a double button function, which makes them harder for kids to figure out.
pros: Clear design makes it easy to see your controllers at all times
Pops open easily with adult hands
Has an adhesive, which keeps them from rattling around like some other models
Comes as a 6-pack, which is more than most sets
cons: These will not work on all stoves
Check your model for knob size

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, prevents child access to stove. If knobs are close, rotate 90 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: One tip: if the knobs are a little bit too close (preventing from squeezing the sides), you can install them sideways and have them open left/right (see my photo). Also, the other tip I read for using the hair dryer to remove the adhesive works very well. I'd installed one of them the wrong way, and using the hair dryer I could get the adhesive off cleanly with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: "underestimatedfrog"

customer_reviews.title: dogs can’t cook, but I can
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep,the dog from burning the house down. Haven’t had a toddler in ages but the puppy insists on seeing what’s on the counter and the stove. Fear of him accidentally turning the gas and/or burner on led me to this product. Super easy to install. I really thought it would be a major pain to use the knobs with these covers but I don’t even give it a second thought now. Once in awhile I forget to put the cover back up and I feel like it would still be protected. Maybe not with a toddler that’s outfitted with those thumb things but for our situation, we’re good. Seem quite durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have a 14mo old great grandson visiting and worried about our gas range with the easy reach front knobs. These arrived promply, popped on effortlessly and are clear, so they do not obstruct the view of the temp control markers. They open/close easily with one hand to access the control. They can be secured with the included double side tape. We elected to leave them loose and it has worked fine. The first thing baby did when he came into the kitchen was make a bee line to the range and start flipping the covers! They just turned harmlessly. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: feels safe
customer_reviews.text: I, by mistake, turned my gas range on, but just on. No fire. Later, was so tired, and sleepy, and though I would just lay my head down on the kitchen table to rest, but not before I found what the terrible smell was. When I though, gas, it smells terrible, checked the stove and sure enough , it had a burner just part way on. In talking to a granddaughter later that day, she told me about this product, I ordered it that day. Now I do not worry that something will catch on a knob and turn on a burner. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ossa

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver - literately
customer_reviews.text: Use the stickies! After breaking so many from my oven door slamming up and breaking the tops of other brands- I was sold in this one bc of the adhesive! I have no idea if the stickers which are branded 3M are going to peel off the labels of my oven- we shall see when the time comes. For now I’ll take safety and ease of use over labels. Very pleased. Also- clear is best- I had dark grey and mistakenly left simmer burner on since was hard to see thru- don’t make that mistake! Happy I was able to catch it in time
customer_reviews.author: Mellen

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective!
customer_reviews.text: They cover the gas range knobs and my 16 month old can't turn them on! Very simple to install; took me about 5 minutes. Just clean off the surface, remove the knobs, place on side of adhesive on the outside of clear plastic, the other sticky side against the range and you can place the knobs back on! The only drawback is there are no instructions but if you have been baby proofing the house then you will know what to do :)
customer_reviews.author: G$$

customer_reviews.title: It keeps little unauthorized hands effectively off range knobs.
customer_reviews.text: I really am pleased with these kitchen safety knob covers. My youngster can reach the knobs but is unable to turn them once they're snapped shut. And they stay snapped shut! The package comes with some double sided tape to secure the knob cover to the stove, but I just put them on without taping them in place and they are still 100 % effective Excellent product. I recommend this product to all those parents that have little curious imps running rampant in their homes, that want to try and get their little hands on everything that they can.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: THEY FIT
customer_reviews.text: My oven door was too close to the knob covers to use with the hinges facing down, so I mounted them in opposite directions with the hinges to the side. They do not interfere with each other even if both covers are open on the same side, and the oven door can open without taking the covers off! I can not attest to the adhesion yet as i just installed them, but they seem sturdy enough. Very easy to install, but check your covers over the knobs before you take the adhesive backing off and permanently mount. I was surprised that my oven could not open with the hinges down! So improvise!
customer_reviews.author: Sacredfire

customer_reviews.title: Dog almost killed us
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep my dog from turning on the gas. I never thought I would need these for a dog. She jumped up on the stove and hit a knob which turned on the gas when I was out of the room. After reading other reviews this seems to happen fairly often to pet owners. Glad to have found these knob covers!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Addison

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This product is great at keeping my 15 month old from playing with the stove knobs. They’re made from a thick durable plastic and very easy to install. Although my husband didn’t even need instructions, I appreciate that Eudamom emailed me installation instructions prior to receiving the product just in case. So far I have had them on a few days and they do the job. My only complaint is that they retain heat. When I used the oven and stove at the same time, the heat from the oven transmitted from the stove knobs to the protectors and they got pretty hot. I was able to work with it but it could cause a potential danger to a child.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A big sigh of relief
customer_reviews.text: My toddler wouldn't leave the oven knobs alone, and while we're constantly supervising him, it made us nervous. We found these knob covers and they snap on super easy, and keep him away from them. All you do to install them is pull the knob off, put the cover on, and put the knob back. They lock into place and open and close just like door knob covers. The closest he gets to them now is enough to bat the cover around a bit. I also thought they would look really out of place, but they fit right into our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Shibby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have too much of a problem with kids and the stove, but in my kitchen, I sometimes bump the stove, the knob turns but does not light the burner, and then I begin to smell gas, And so this product is a great safety measure in preventing problems caused by adults too! The quality is excellent, and several friends really like them as well: "A good find!" They are precisely engineered and made of top-quality materials. I recommend this product without reservation! Ah... I meant to mention that these covers seem to be large enough to fit most stove knobs. Thanks for the fine product design and the affordable price. --gfd
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine, easy to open and install!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my GE double stove gas range perfect. I did have to cut the adhesive tape down to half ( going around the outer edge) so I could see the temperature numbers. It was really no big deal. I have no small children at home, but I would rub up against this one knob and it would turn on the gas without me noticing. Also would move by the nose of my dog. All the other knobs stay in place until being pushed in and turned, so only needed one. Will keep the others for replacements or give them to others who can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Downer

customer_reviews.title: Kid & Kitten Safety!
customer_reviews.text: Down 1-star for ease of use because they nearly butt up against each other which can make it a little tricky to open. However, it’s still VERY doable/usable and they do exactly what we need them to do! We actually installed them because we have kittens who are very mischievous and so thinks like turn on water faucets. The way our stove dials lay would make it easy for the “kids” to turn it slightly enough to turn on the gas. Wanting to avoid a kitten:stovetop disaster!
customer_reviews.author: BLM-RN

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit
customer_reviews.text: Our stove knobs require you to push them in slightly to be able to turn them. This is not a unique feature as a lot of stoves require this. Our knobs are about 2.5" wide and while the description states it will work with this size, the design of the covers is such that when installed, but back of the cover stops the knob from being fully depressed. Thus, with the covers installed, we can't actually operate the knob. Beware if your knobs are 2.5" because this product will likely not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Venters

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric stove and the front controls for the turbo boil burner kept getting bumped and accidently turned on. After the last time with a loaf of bread sitting on the cooktop and catching fire with melted plastic everywhere, I needed something to prevent the accidental turn on. These installed easily, work great and also prevent my young grandsons from playing with the knobs. I have yet to use the "sticky" tape to hold them perfectly in place and so far, haven't found the need to do so. I have a Kenmore Elite slide-in electric range (made by Frigidaire).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best burner covers
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and keep our 2 yr old’s fingers away from our gas stove knobs. Before we bought these she turned a burner on one day that we didn’t notice for over 10 minutes, which had been leaking gas into the house. Got some other ones from a friend to try and they broke within 2 weeks. Bought these after reading multiple reviews online and have been VERY happy with them. Come with a sticky backing so they stay put and don’t swivel around and you can install them so the top parts don’t open towards the burners and get hot. Most durable baby safety item we’ve bought through our 4 kids in last 15 years!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Over time, my stove top knobs have gotten a little loose. Since they are on the front of the stove, it got to the point where they flame would get turned on if I leaned over the front. I was so afraid of setting myself on fire that I started looking and found these. They attached easily. Work as stated. The only drawback is the drawer that opens perpendicular to the front of the stove brushes against the now-deeper knob area. Only slightly so still worth having, maybe I'll get the drawer front trimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: In first weeks - works well to keep stove top knobs safe
customer_reviews.text: Our issue wasn't children, it was the accidental adult passing by the stove that turned on the gas - or - was it the cat. The knob covers are clear, so can easily see position of dial (although adhesive patch blocks view of numbers on the dial). They are easy to open by pressing in on the sides. We do have concerns how well they will age - as the heat from the oven as it escapes from the oven door may cause them to get brittle. Only time will tell. If that happens will edit review.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion, easy (but not too easy) to open and close
customer_reviews.text: After a knob got bumped once, we decided we wanted these especially since getting ready to baby proof the house. Great instructions and great adhesion. We used it on Kenmore Elite stove top knobs. It's good to make sure and plan to place them to give your fingers some space to open these as they open by pressing on the sides. Other than just being aware of that, this is a great purchase and has been holding up well with fairly frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: S.B. Powell

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpuse
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the adhesive stickers since I was afraid it would melt onto the stove, and we live in an apartment. This makes the knob covers spin around and sometimes prevent the oven door from opening/closing. If I used the adhesive or if my oven was larger, this wouldn't be an issue. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Effective safety device for stoves
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way to keep stoves safe from children. They are easy to mount, easy to open and close for adults, and effective at stumping toddlers. They aren’t very noticeable at all being clear, but you can’t put an aesthetic price on safety as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Clark

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: our condo has a very small kitchen with a gas stove, took my grandson about two seconds to turn on the stove, we installed these covers and that keeps little prying hands as well as accidental bumps from turning on the stove hightly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: S. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: They work, and my dog cant burn down the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my new cattle dog jumped up and turned on the gas...yikes glad I was home😣 i bought these for my Samsung gas range, and they fit perfectly over the 5 spaced-out knobs. Just make sure to clean and degrease the metal under the knobs so the adhesive rings gets a clean, dry surface to grab on to.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Missing the adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Well will likely send them back. Got them in the mail without the adhesive. Disappointed because they fit and do exactly what they are supposed to but look ugly just hanging without the adhesive. No idea how to reach the manufacturer directly. Seems like they would be great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MamaSam987

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is good design and it fits my stove well. But there are some drawbacks here where the mounting tape seems to be flimsy and the joints are not very smooth on 2 out of 4 I mounted. It became a little hard to open for those two.
customer_reviews.author: Audi Quattro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safety measure
customer_reviews.text: My mom moved into a new apartment with a very narrow kitchen. Her big booty kept knocking into the knobs and turning the gas on. I was worried and would do this and not realize, starting a fire or getting carbon monoxide poisoning, so I bought her these. She was able to install them easily and I don't have to worry she'll turn the gas on.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena

customer_reviews.title: Safety 1st
customer_reviews.text: It a good product to keep the toddlers from turning on the stove but be mindful that although they can't turn the knobs the toddlers can pull the knobs from the stove. My 6 year old was trying to figure out how to open the safety case and pulled the knob from the stove and in a panic she hid the knob and the case with the knob inside.
customer_reviews.author: Hernetha Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for safety!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! Kept accidentally turning the knobs when leaning against stove. Scary! Also keeps us safe from toddler turning knobs. I'm not handy in the least and I did it super easily. Great quality. I did mine flipping upward so it didnt get in the way of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Henricks

customer_reviews.title: They melt with the oven heat
customer_reviews.text: So I was sooo excited about these, I got them and installed them right away, extra happy because my baby could not play with the knots anymore... well, same day I installed them, I turn on the oven to cook and these safety knots melt a little wot the oven heat and now are stuck and I can not either open them or close them! If it’s supposed to be for the kitchen stove, they should melt!!!! I tried to look for a number to contact them, but didn’t have the option in my app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: After my cats lit a burner on my last range, burning it and nearly my home, I didn't want to take chances with my new range. Better than removing the knobs or shutting off the gas. Slightly cumbersome to install, and if your knobs are close together you'll need to turn the covers when installing so you can access the lock tabs. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stanic

customer_reviews.title: They do their job and my toddler has tested them well
customer_reviews.text: Moved into an apartment where the stove knobs are right within reach of my curious 2yo hands. They serve their purpose and have given me peaceof mind but I never used the adhesive so I can't comment on how well they stay put. Very easy to install and have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: MM14

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: A little too big for my liking, but I understand that the product was designed to universally fit most to all stove knobs, which can sometimes be large. Children can't mess with the knobs anymore which is what I was aiming for. Well worth the cost, and super efficient
customer_reviews.author: Tiahna Green

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried if they works ok for my gas stove. The installation was super easy and they look pretty neat and clean! Now I don't have to worried about my cats accidentally turn them on. This is perfect! So glad that I purchased it!!
customer_reviews.author: kokohiro

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased/ Viking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the Viking gas stove at our new home. Had to take the neck plates off but fits perfectly and stays in place with the 3m tape. Very pleased with this purchase. So far the dog and my two little ones have not been able to tamper with the stove
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler, and moved into a new house with a modern/6-knob oven. These are perfect. Easy to use for the adults and keep the toddler hands off the knobs. I loved that it was a 6-pack as most others were only 5.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby proofing product I’ve used so far. I was so alarmed when my two-year-old son turned on our gas stove all by himself one day. He is normally so obedient that I don’t have to worry, but the excitement of the flames was too much, I guess. We ordered these that day and installed them as soon as they arrived. Haven’t had a problem since!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing we child proofed in our home were the knobs on our gas stove. These were super easy to install. They can be easily removed for cleaning. I was afraid they'd be hard to open and close, but I can do so with ease...but not so much ease that a toddler could do the same.
customer_reviews.author: emlibrarian

customer_reviews.title: Knob Blocker
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this set to prevent my son from turning the knobs. So far so good. Installing was easy. I didn’t use the double sided tape though. I just don’t want to make it more of chore to remove down the line. They work great and are fairly easy to open to operate. Does exactly what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: The product works as it should. The installation was easy (my husband was nervous about taking off the stove knobs, but they came off super easy), my toddler likes to touch and spin them, but can't get them open, so it does what it's supposed to do! Easy to open when needed (for adults). I'm happy with the value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petrushun

customer_reviews.title: Works even when installed improperly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and his wife to put on their stove to keep my granddaughter from turning on the stove. I asked my daughter in law how they work. She said that they didn't install them properly, but they still work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is NOT large as described
customer_reviews.text: I measured to make sure these would fit my larger LG knobs and they should have got fine based on the description, the size is smaller than listed. They do NOT fit LG knobs. They are the same size as any standard knob cover and not large. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Could be a life saver! My year and a half old granddaughter turned the knob on my stove... I always keep a good eye on her because she’s discovering things now but it took under 5 seconds and she had the gas on 9 and until the smell hit we had no idea! I had no idea u could buy these I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cssmith

customer_reviews.title: Baby safety .
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install just a few minutes ,no tools needed strong adhesive to keep in place but the best part is that my Grandkid of 18 months is not able to open the knobs to the stove , great peace of mind to know even if he hangs around the kitchen he cant play with that anymore , after installed the operation to open is quite simple just squeeze and release to activate stove again .
customer_reviews.author: DAVID N GARDUNO

customer_reviews.title: Works great , thank you 🙏
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping someone thought of this safety feature otherwise I would have got a new oven , works great , easy to install , I did not glue it in and it works as good. Thank you . I got this thanks to my cat that likes to visit the kitchen at night and somehow manages to turn the knob a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnydaisy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the stove safe from the dog
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 kids and have never had to put child locks on our stoves. We now have an English Mastiff who has twice accidentally turned on our gas stove by hitting it with his nose. These locks have worked perfect since putting them on and we no longer worry he’s going to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie

customer_reviews.title: Best for safety with my kids.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. I am thrilled with it. 100% necessary for my kids with our new gas stove. Easy to use, sticks great, and even the kids like to close them, but can't open them.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Adult safety needed here
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for safety no kids I kept hitting on with out knowing Not using sticky pad to hold in place because I will need to clean in future Plan on never not having on
customer_reviews.author: lets ride HD

customer_reviews.title: Safety and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I love these covers. They were easy to install and are easy to use. Having them gives me peace of mind as I no longer worry about my range being accidentally turned on by me, my cat, or curious visiting toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fenstermacher

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit over thermador Professional brand stove knobs
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would fit my knobs due to someone else's comment about it fitting their thermador stove knobs but these are not wide enough to fit over the metal part once blue knob is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Happymomma2020

customer_reviews.title: Very useful but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and easy to u stall. but not sturdy enough. The material is easily broken or cracked as mine is broken already though I do have couple of extras. It was a pack of six and I needed only four
customer_reviews.author: EVA C

customer_reviews.title: Works but oven door hits.
customer_reviews.text: These are very floppy and hang down so far the oven door hits them. I guess they are supposed to come with some sort of adhesive. Not in my case.
customer_reviews.author: artvark

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, safety product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use. Keeps kids from playing with stove and getting hurt. Good safety. We didn’t use adhesion part but comes with it. There are 6 knob covers included, we use 5 on our stove. Easy to assemble/put on. Easy to open for adults to use the stove.
customer_reviews.author: tricia77r

customer_reviews.title: Great baby proof option!
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect solution to my 1.5 yr old always messing with the knobs! I chose not to use the adhesive because I didn’t want to stick anything to my new stove. But they stay on fine without it. They spin, but that doesn’t bother me!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Great safety device for gas stoves.
customer_reviews.text: Used at our apartment that had a gas stove with handles that kids could reach. Can be a nuisance, but deff a good safety device.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Baby Proofing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my gas stove kept accidentally getting turned on. It hasn't happened since we installed them. They are super easy to use and install. My baby cannot open them. They are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mama

customer_reviews.title: Way to Install and Use
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. My son immediately tested them out. The knob inside didn't turn. He played with it a little bit, but once he figured out it did nothing, he left it alone. They were easy to install and easy to open for me, my husband, and my sitter. I'm still wary of whether it can withstand the heat, but it had no issues with our oven being on.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Gas knob covers work great.
customer_reviews.text: Did not use the adhesion because it would cover my burner words. They will spin if someone plays with them but this has not been a problem for me. We are really glad we purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old can defeat them
customer_reviews.text: It’s too easy for my 4 year old to open them. Check my video showing how easy it is for him to open the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We moved into our new home on March 5th, and the gas stove terrified me. We have a 20mo and a 3yo and occasionally babysit a 2yo. There bad boys are toddler-proof. Super easy to install, adhere flawlessly (make sure your knob area is squeaky clean), and don’t interfere with oven function. Will recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy use, safe for kids, great investment
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and fast installation and even faster use. Pur kid still plays with it but cannot do anything harmful. Excellent buy for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Great description and available in different sizes Works well to ...
customer_reviews.text: I went on the. Web to research the safety knob. Great description and available in different sizes Works well to prevent my cat from turning on the stove
customer_reviews.author: Mei Yee

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until we used our oven
customer_reviews.text: These worked great until we used our oven for about an hour the other day. The heat made a couple of the protective covers brittle at the joints, which cause them to snap and break when opened
customer_reviews.author: Latha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my dog couldn't accidently turn the gas on the stove. Really easy to apply and they stay. Make sure sure you clean the area around the knob before applying these though or they will not stick.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Dingler

customer_reviews.title: It protects the knobs from grease too
customer_reviews.text: My mother wanted these for knob protection against grease, lol. They work like a charm. It’s easier to clean and we keep them close when not in use. She loves it on her new stove.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Made our stove safe. My daughter grew tall enough to reach the knobs and is fascinated by me cooking. She always tried to turn them on. With these she can reach but now can't open them to turn on the knobs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elton

customer_reviews.title: They melted
customer_reviews.text: They looked nice and worked great, for about 2 weeks. After that, they actually melted. The heat from the oven and stove are too much, and the plastic can't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These product works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works really very well and easy to install and to operate them. They are very effective child proof so far.
customer_reviews.author: lidy C

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't stick then to my stove but they cover the knobs great and still do what they are supposed to!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. We clipped them on, and whenever I have bumped in the stove area, the safety mechanism spins, but the stove does NOT turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works for now
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cheapy. The one on the main burner is either broken or weakened after just a few weeks. Easy to install. Easy to use. I have less ratings for durability. Update: If you use the broiler with the door open, it will melt these.
customer_reviews.author: Randi H

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The item was purchased as a Safety addition for our fridgaire electric stove
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: Safety 1st
customer_reviews.text: These things are a life saver. I am horrible at walking past an oven and hitting the knobs by accident. I bought these more due to me then my kids. They are not to bulky. Easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Larger than standard, breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for our stove, so they got in the way of the oven door opening, and kept popping off. Baby saw it and started pulling them off himself and throwing them on the floor. We managed to break all of them in about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Carol Ramey

customer_reviews.title: much needed
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. has kept our toddler from killing us all. the adhesive is sturdy. my daughter has tried her best to knock these off and they are holding strong
customer_reviews.author: Apash

customer_reviews.title: Prevention
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law had a habit of leaving the stove on and walking away. We are using this a way for her to remember that the stove is on. One time she bumped one of the knobs on the store; the house filled with gas. Installing these Safety Children and mother-in-law Kitchen Stove Gas Knob has prevented any more of the issues above.
customer_reviews.author: kcruz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Child Protection
customer_reviews.text: Item came professionally packaged and was very easy to install. These appear to be very sturdy and easy to use. They fit great on Samsung Oven. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Novak

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My only complaint is it makes it difficult to open and close the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product. Recommend it for any one with Kids  and open kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, safe for kids, strong adhesive and very easily.
customer_reviews.author: BNKV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Item that has solved our bumping the Oven Control that causes over baking
customer_reviews.author: Jayss

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, flawed design
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install, however they don't work. I am still able to turn on 2 of the burners with the covers closed. Good concept, flawed design
customer_reviews.author: KIWI

customer_reviews.title: Easy, very HANDY AND SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Very easy, very handy and SAFE for my kids. I totally recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: GladysEstefani

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my lab mix from turning on the gas while we are away.
customer_reviews.text: Our pup likes to put his paws up on the counters to hunt for crumbs. I was worried he might turn the gas on and this gives me some peace of mind when we are not home.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Snapped Off
customer_reviews.text: Literally, all of the caps on these have snapped off within a couple of months of use. If you even bump them while cooking, they break right off. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Black

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Little bulky for my stove, kept bumping into the oven door. Take measurements if you can.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Perform Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these, and they fit our Whirlpool gas stove great. Easy to install, and they prevent little hands from turning the knobs on the stove. Deducting one star, as two of the six seem less durable/didn't open as smoothly as the other four. Luckily, we only needed 4 for our stove so the other two were extra
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldCity B

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Only thing is it’s so bulky I can’t close my oven without fighting with these things to close my oven! They do serve their purpose but too bulky, total inconvenience if ur making anything in the oven
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER ZEVALLOS

customer_reviews.title: Toddler doesn't mess with the stove knobs anymore
customer_reviews.text: It's a new discovery for him! Mommy is the kitchen and all this things the turn and make noises! Once these babies were installed, he stopped playing with them and only sticks with the utensils provided for him to bang on. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Giggle

customer_reviews.title: Great safety product!
customer_reviews.text: They work perfect for the safety issue we were having! Highly recommend if you have a gas stove with children in the home.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on the knobs. Enough space between to open and close. It seems very stuck on there. I hope it lasts a long time! Very happy so far.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but the advertised size was a bit off from what I received.

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTALLMENT, SAFETY FIRST
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these gas stove knob covers for my daughter's stove. She has an who an 11 mo. old. The covers work fine. Easy installment. My daughter seems pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bosse

customer_reviews.title: A toddler confuser
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look too bad on the new stove and seems to do the trick on keeping him from turning the knobs. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive comes loose within a month
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and fit our larger-than-normal oven knobs. However within about a month the adhesive began to let go. I don't think they'll last much longer. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TeamTP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are great, Installation took just a minute and they're very sturdy. So far, our toddler has not figured out how to open them so we feel much more secure having him in the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was the right product for my 1.5 year old who learned how to break other types of covers.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well, and doesn’t get in the way of the oven door!
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad too wide. The spots to press to open are on the sides, but there’s not enough room to get my fingers in there comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyLizz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I put this up in my parent's house cause my little niece spends quite some time there. I loved this product. Easy to install and durable. I put them up when my niece was around 1 year and some months. Now she is almost three and this covers are still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy

customer_reviews.title: Simple Solution for Safety.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use - keeps our home safe.

customer_reviews.text: These are kinda bigger in diameter than i wanted bit they are completely functional so i can work with it. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K.

product_meta.title: EUDEMON Clear 6pack Safety Children Kitchen Stove Gas Knob Covers (Clear)
feature_bullets: ★Easy Install---Install the stove knob cover with 3M VHB Adhesive tape, no drill or tools need.3M VHB adhesive with strong viscous (Effect will be better after 24 hours.) and can be removed easily without any residual, no harm to the stove.The 3M VHB tape makes the cover and the knob a whole thing ,avoid babies' curiosity to play with them.The cover won't hang on the stove knob,flopping all over the place,and avoid scratching the cooktop while using.

★Special double button design/No Hinges Design---Special double button makes it hard for babies to open it but is easy for adults to open/close with one hand to access the control.Special No Hinges Design helps parents to release the knob cover easily for washing and cleaning, and can be buckle up by just clip on the cover cap.

★PC material(Clear &Heat-resistan) ---Made of high quality PC material and resistance to high temperature of 120℃,please feel relieved to use.The clear stove knob cover do not cover the view of the temperature control markers when closed.

★Why Need it---Prevent children from opening stove and getting injured(like getting burnt or cause fire or gas poison), prevent babies from pulling the gas knob away and lost them.Not only prevent babies or adults accidentally turn the gas on but also prevent pets (dogs or cats) from playing with the stove knobs.

★Tips & Application Range---This Stove knob cover has its limitations,it suits for most kind of stove knobs,pls kindly measure the stove knob before purchase,otherwise it may can't be used.The distance between two nearest stove knobs should be more than 3.94""(≥10cm);the height of stove knob should be less than 1.89""(≤4.8cm);the diameter of stove knob should less than 2.56""(≤6.5cm).
